column4: I'm trying to play a .mpg and a .avi from my usb stick and totem says it can not play it. Is it cause of some codecs not being installed by default?
give me a sec, there was a forum thread about it somewhere
look around http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=94 and keep in mind it's 3 pages long so there might be some more relevant stuff at the end
